newsitem.title: USA: Interstate Bakeries buys bread maker.
newsitem.headline: Interstate Bakeries buys bread maker.

text.p: Interstate Bakeries Corp said Monday its Interstate Brands Corp subsidiary acquired the assets of the San Francisco French Bread Co from privately held Specialty Foods Corp for undisclosed terms.

San Francisco French Bread produces and distributes sourdough breads and rolls principally under the Parisian, Columbo and Toscana brand names throughout northern California as well as in the San Diego area. It had 1996 sales of about $100 million.
Interstate Bakeries is a wholesale baking company with 62 bread and cake bakeries.
